Pre-Game Insights: The Washington Nationals and New York Mets were set to face off with the Nationals having a 68-83 record and the Mets at 83-68.
The pitching matchup featured LHP DJ Herz (4-7; 3.70 ERA) for the Nationals against LHP Jose Quintana (9-9; 3.91 ERA) for the Mets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nationals were preparing for a four-game series in Chicago after the series against the Mets.The Nationals had a 32-44 road record and a 7-8 month record.
Others: The game was the 152nd game of the season and the 77th road game for the Nationals.The Nationals were looking to rebound after a 10-1 loss to the Mets the previous night.
